identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

colors.gradients: NONE. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

layout.container_padding: p-6 or p-8 for internal content
layout.rtl_strategy: Use logical properties (ms-, me-, ps-, pe-) instead of left/right. Ensure flex-direction: row-reverse is NOT manually applied; let the dir='rtl' attribute handle it naturally.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-indigo-950 text-white hover:bg-indigo-900 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: rounded-full bg-white text-indigo-950 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-indigo-200 transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: rounded-lg border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 focus:border-indigo-500 transition-all duration-200
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-1.5 block

tables.header: h-12 px-4 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

visual_enhancers.radius: Nested radii: child <= parent. Standard: rounded-xl for containers, rounded-lg for inner elements.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Hover states on ALL interactive elements. Scale up slightly (scale-[1.02]) on cards.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background (opacity 0.02) to reduce digital flatness.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default). For specific HR metaphors, use Phosphor Icons if needed.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise.
Do NOT use generic centered layouts. Use the Bento Grid.
Do NOT use AI assistant emojis (ðŸ¤–, ðŸš€, etc.).
ALWAYS add data-testid to interactive elements.
ALWAYS use Shadcn 'Calendar' for dates and 'Select' for dropdowns.
Ensure contrast ratios meet APCA standards.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a professional, multi-language HR platform. Prioritize clarity, hierarchy, and human-centric design. Use the provided image URLs for the 'About' or 'Team' sections. Ensure the dashboard is widget-based and customizable. Strictly follow the RTL strategy for Arabic support.
